content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5) containing iron plates
- Additional burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5) and wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line at (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Two burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5) containing copper plates

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 35.5) facing right
- Boiler at (7.0, 35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5, 35.5)
- PipeGroup connecting offshore pump to boiler with water
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine with steam
- Electricity distribution network with multiple electric poles

### Unused Structures
- Offshore pump at (-5.5, 26.5) - not connected to any system

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to place entities without having them in inventory
- Before attempting to place an assembling machine or any other entity, ensure it exists in the inventory
- Craft required entities before attempting placement

### Power system warnings
- Address "No fluid present in connections" warning for the unused offshore pump by either connecting it to a system or removing it

### Furnace efficiency
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" warning - ensure continuous supply of raw materials
- Consider setting up automated material input systems
